alert.note: Alert for Geary; Jackson; Marshall; Morris; Osage; Pottawatomie; Riley; Shawnee; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:56AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Geary, Riley, northeastern Morris, western Shawnee, Wabaunsee, northwestern Osage, Pottawatomie, southwestern Jackson and southern Marshall Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 555 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Randolph to 3 miles south of Manhattan to 4 miles northeast of Council Grove Lake. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Wamego, Rossville, Alma, Westmoreland, Eskridge, Blaine, St. Marys, Dover, Onaga, St. George, Maple Hill, Alta Vista, McFarland, Paxico, Olsburg, Belvue, Emmett, Louisville and Delia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 309 and 348. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 161 and 165. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Geary; Jackson; Marshall; Morris; Osage; Pottawatomie; Riley; Shawnee; Wabaunsee
